ygData.subject: Re: Cyclops Eye?
ygData.msgSnippet: Cyclops killing is almost a waste of time.  Having killed at least 500+ with my wizard and at least over a 100+ with my Shadow Knight, I ve never seen such an
ygData.messageBody:
Cyclops killing is almost a waste of time. Having killed at least 500+ with
my wizard and at least over a 100+ with my Shadow Knight, I've never seen
such an item.

And please stay off the topic of pets. lol. I think we should come up with
a plan to improve our class. Seems like the other fighter races get graced
with far more "weapons / items" then we do. Kinda sad if you ask me.


----Original Message Follows----
From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>

I've killed a dozen cyclopses in my day, and never seen an eye.
Has anyone out there ever found one?

Do I have to start a thread about lifetap or pets to get people
to talk?

Xilith

-=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
